item.title: Dexter Holland
item.description: Dr. Bryan Keith 'Dexter' Holland is an American musician who is the lead vocalist, rhythm guitarist, and primary songwriter of the American rock band the Offspring. He is also the creator of the hot sauce Gringo Bandito, launched in 2004. In 2017, Holland attained a PhD degree in molecular biology.

item.title: Greg K
item.description: Gregory David Kriesel, known professionally as Greg K., is an American musician known as the bass guitarist and backing vocalist for the American rock band the Offspring from 1984 to 2018.

item.title: Noodles
item.description: Kevin John Wasserman, better known by his stage name Noodles, is an American musician and singer who serves as the lead guitarist and backing vocalist for The Offspring.
